ClassDesc: Callers should migrate to using @B_android#content#ContentResolver#loadThumbnail_E@, since it offers richer control over requested thumbnail sizes and cancellation behavior. This class provides utility methods to obtain thumbnails for various @B_android#provider#MediaStore#Images_E@ items.
